name: lineman
content:
lineman noun [C]
(AMERICAN FOOTBALL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in American football, a player on the forward line who protects other members of the team and stops plays (= periods of action) by the opposing team

lineman noun [C]
(POWER LINES)
(UK linesman) a person whose job is to repair phone and electricity lines
